Assorted Cards (Pages 21 & 22 In The Book)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): FAQ: All The Skill Cards: Assorted Cards (Pages 21 & 22 In The Book)
By Anonymous on Tuesday, June 26, 2001 - 05:40 pm:

card namegutsa.m./brespe/enveffect
Dodge0a.m.dgedodges pow or int moves. your guts become 0
Will Power1a.m.speuse with pow or int attacks. if monsters's life is 2 or less attack becomes twice as strong
Grit2a.m.blkwhen life reaches 0 this card adds one point. this monster can use no defense against monster using grit.
Help1brespe1 pow can't ko monster with this
Mango0brespe1 healing point
Wild Rush3brespemakes top 5 cards into guts. no other card may be used this turn.
Cool Judge1breenvdraw one card only
Hot Battle2breenvadds 1 damage point to damage. both pow and int
Excited2breenvtakes away 2 damage points from int attacks
Encourage3breenvmakes it take 1 less guts to use attacks
Nice Fight3breenvif damage is 3 or lower pow or int moves not available
Confusion4breenvtop 2 cards are discarded when draw step begins
Critical2a.m.speadds 2 to pow or int attack
Last Trump0brespereturn one card to stack. shuffle and draw one card
Retreat1a.m.dgeall monsters dodge moves doing multiple monster damage
Grand End0a.m.speuse when stacked cards are 0. damage becomes 3 times greater. use with both pow and int.
Good Luck0a.m.speKO's this monster. Makes top discards guts with amount equal to remaining life amount.cant use if short of discards.
Fainted5brespeboth guts become 0
Twinkling4brespeuse when only one monster is left. makes all stack cards guts.
Reborn2bresperevives ko'd phoenix and gives it 4 life points
Jump In0a.m.spedamage for pow attack becomes 2x stronger. next turn becomes 3x stronger.
Last Man1a.m.speuse when only one monster is left. for one turn monster can use as many skill cards as it wants.
PO1a.m.spethis monster cannot block or dodge for one turn. makes your pow or int attack double damage.
Busy Time0brespereturn all guts cards to stack cards and reshuffle
